meanings.definition: To write or inscribe on a scroll.
meanings.sent1: She enscrolls her thoughts on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The scribe carefully enscrolls the historical events.
meanings.sent3: The wizard enscrolls a magical spell on the parchment.
meanings.sent4: His love for her enscrolls itself in every line he writes.
meanings.sent5: The artist enscrolls intricate designs on the delicate paper.

meanings.definition: To record or document in a scroll.
meanings.sent1: The historian enscrolls the important events of the past.
meanings.sent2: The librarian enscrolls the titles of the ancient manuscripts.
meanings.sent3: The detective enscrolls clues on the mysterious scroll.
meanings.sent4: Her memories enscroll themselves in the pages of her diary.
meanings.sent5: The explorer enscrolls the map of his adventures on the scroll.

meanings.definition: To enroll or register in a list or record.
meanings.sent1: The students enscroll for the new semester.
meanings.sent2: The clerk enscrolls the names of the new members.
meanings.sent3: The chef enscrolls the special dishes on the menu.
meanings.sent4: His achievements enscroll him in the hall of fame.
meanings.sent5: The team enscrolls their victories on the championship plaque.
